feed.title: Test Feed - Atom Format
feed.subtitle: An Atom feed for testing purposes

entry.title: Atom Entry One - First Post
entry.content: This is the content of the first Atom entry. Atom feeds use a different structure than RSS but contain the same information types.

entry.title: Atom Entry Two - Second Post
entry.content: This is the content of the second Atom entry. The fetcher should handle both RSS and Atom formats correctly.
